languages.text: "Первый на моей памяти Винтерскейл, который сначала говорит, а не сразу стреляет или рубит".
"The first Winterscale in my memory who prefers to talk first rather than shoot and slash."
languages.original_text: "Первый на моей памяти Винтерскейл, который сначала говорит, а не сразу стреляет или рубит".

traits.locale_text: "The first Winterscale in my memory who prefers to talk first rather than shoot or cut."
"The first Winterscale in my memory who prefers to talk first rather than shoot or cut."
"The first Winterscale in my memory who prefers to talk first rather than shoot and slash."
"The first Winterscale in my memory who prefers to talk first rather than shoot and slash."
"The first Winterscale in my memory who prefers to talk first rather than shoot and slash."
"The first Winterscale in my memory who prefers to talk first rather than shoot and slash."

languages.text: «El primer Winterscale que prefiere hablar antes de ponerse a disparar y acuchillar a todo lo que ve del que tengo conocimiento».
languages.original_text: "The first Winterscale in my memory who prefers to talk first rather than shoot and slash."

traits.locale_text: «El primer Winterscale que prefiere hablar antes de ponerse a disparar y acuchillar a todo lo que ve del que tengo conocimiento».

languages.text: "Der erste Winterzunder in meiner Erinnerung, der es vorzieht, erst zu reden, statt sofort zu schießen und zu stechen."
languages.original_text: "The first Winterscale in my memory who prefers to talk first rather than shoot and slash."

traits.locale_text: "Der erste Winterzunder in meiner Erinnerung, der es vorzieht, erst zu reden, statt sofort zu schießen und zu stechen."

languages.text: « C'est bien le premier Winterscale dont j'entends parler qui préfère discuter plutôt que d'en découdre. »
languages.original_text: "The first Winterscale in my memory who prefers to talk first rather than shoot and slash."

traits.locale_text: « C'est bien le premier Winterscale dont j'entends parler qui préfère discuter plutôt que d'en découdre. »

languages.text: “如果我没记错的话，温特斯凯尔家族的创始人更愿意先试着进行谈判，不会直接冲上去大开杀戒。”
languages.original_text: "The first Winterscale in my memory who prefers to talk first rather than shoot and slash."

traits.locale_text: “如果我没记错的话，温特斯凯尔家族的创始人更愿意先试着进行谈判，不会直接冲上去大开杀戒。”

languages.text: 「私の記憶の中では、ウィンタースケール家の中で撃ち合いや斬り合いよりも、まず対話を好む初めての者です」
languages.original_text: "The first Winterscale in my memory who prefers to talk first rather than shoot and slash."

traits.locale_text: 「私の一番古い記憶のウィンタースケールは、銃や剣を構えるより、まずは対話を好む方々ですよ」
「私の記憶の中では、ウィンタースケール家の中で撃ち合いや斬り合いよりも、まず対話を好む初めての者です」

languages.text: "Vurup kırmaktansa konuşmayı yeğleyen bir Winterscale'i ilk defa duyuyorum."
languages.original_text: "The first Winterscale in my memory who prefers to talk first rather than shoot and slash."

traits.locale_text: "Vurup kırmaktansa konuşmayı yeğleyen bir Winterscale'i ilk defa duyuyorum."
